aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.subtitle2: Your window to the world of Retail
aboutus.content: Indiaretailing.com, offers a window to the world of Retail in India. It is an initiative of IMAGES Group, a retail intelligence organisation that is trusted globally as the catalyst for profitable growth of modern Indian retail through knowledge platform leadership. Headquartered in New Delhi, the IMAGES Group has offices across Indian metros and the Middle East.

aboutus.title: Our Vision
aboutus.content: To be trusted as the catalyst for profitable growth of modern retail, through knowledge platform leadership.

aboutus.title: Our Mission
aboutus.content: Profitably connecting our Consumers & Customers to businesses, people, knowledge and ideas associated with modern retail.
